entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -25.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:06 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow

Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 78 %

Dewpoint: -28.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
